title: Smart Data Models - Parks and Gardens / Greenspace Record
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of the conditions recorded on a particular area or point inside a greenspace (flower bed, garden, etc.).

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity Type: It has to be GreenspaceRecord

dateObserved.description: Property. The date and time of this observation in ISO8601 UTCformat. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'

soilTemperature.description: Property. The observed soil temperature in Celsius degrees. Units:'degrees Celsius'. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'

soilMoistureVwc.description: Property. The observed soil moisture measured as Volumetric Water Content, VWC (percentage, expressed in parts per one). Model:'https://schema.org/Number'

soilMoistureEc.description: Property. The observed soild moisture measured as Electrical Conductivity, EC in units of Siemens per meter (S/m). Units:'Siemens per meter'. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'

soilMoisturePressure.description: Property. The observed soild moisture measured as Pressure, presure in units of kiloPascals (kPa). Units:'kPa'. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

refGreenspace.description: Relationship. The garden or flower bed to which this record refers to. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

refDevice.description: Relationship. The device or devices used to obtain the data expressed by this record. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

refWeatherObserved.description: Relationship.  Weather observed associated to the measurements described by this entity. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'.

litterCoverage.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Percentage of the surface covered with litter or other waste materials
